articles.title: Padres rally in 9th to hang tough in NL West - MLB.com
articles.description: LOS ANGELES -- The Padres would like you to know that, halfway through their 2022 season, they’re still very much alive in the National League West. They proved it with a ninth-inning rally on Sunday afternoon that they needed in the absolute worst way.

articles.author: Evan Petzold, Detroit Free Press
articles.title: Tarik Skubal struggles again as Detroit Tigers drop series finale to K.C. Royals, 7-4 - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: Detroit Tigers left-hander Tarik Skubal couldn't finish five innings for the third straight game as the Tigers fell, 7-4, to the Kansas City Royals.
articles.content:
Less than 24 hours after a pair of big swings, the Detroit Tigers failed to capitalize on a bases-loaded opportunity in the fifth inning and walked too many batters in Sunday's game.
The Tigers walk… [+7932 chars]

articles.title: McLaughlin stays ahead of chaos to take IndyCar win at Mid-Ohio - RACER
